caption: This folk song features the lead melody played on a rebab instrument which sounds like violins. This song has a Middle-Eastern melody. This is accompanied by traditional Middle-Eastern percussion. A tambourine is played in the background. The other instruments are not clear due to the low quality of the audio. There are no voices in this song. This is an instrumental song. This song can be played at a village scene in a movie.
